'Mettupalayam' is a taluk of Coimbatore Rural district, located to the north of
the city of Coimbatore on the way to Ooty. It is located in the foot hills of
Nilgiri hills about 38Â km north of downtown Coimbatore, in the Indian state
of Tamil Nadu. Mettupalayam is the third largest township in the district and
one of the fast developing suburbs on the northern side of Coimbatore.
categories: Cities and towns in Coimbatore district
